windows.post_hook: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path server; cd server; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/84194a2f286ef7c14ed7ce0090dba59902951553/server.jar -OutFile server.jar; 'eula=true' | Out-File -Encoding ASCII eula.txt
